mapper.select: SELECT id,cast(familyId as CHAR(32)) familyId,#{msgType} as type, cast(userId as CHAR(32)) as userId,CONCAT(#{imgPath},imgUrl) as imgUrl,content as msg,nick,createTime as time,IFNULL(toUrl,"") as toUrl FROM imGlobal where familyId=#{familyId} and id<${id} order by id desc limit 30

SELECT id,cast(familyId as CHAR(32)) familyId,cast(msgType as CHAR(32)) as type, cast(userId as CHAR(32)) as userId,CONCAT(#{imgPath},imgUrl) as imgUrl,content as msg,nick,createTime as time,IFNULL(toUrl,"") as toUrl FROM imGlobal where msgType=#{msgType} and familyId=#{familyId} and id<${id} order by id desc limit 30
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO imLog (userId,channelId,inTime,inTimeStr,offTime,offTimeStr, onlineTime) VALUES (#{userId},#{channelId},#{inTime},#{inTimeStr},#{offTime},#{offTimeStr},#{onlineTime})
mapper.delete: delete from imLog where userId=#{userId} and onlineTime=-1
